recipe.name: Edna's Cranberry Sauce
recipe.preparation: Cook cranberries in orange juice until they pop.  Strain.  Stir in sugar.  Bring to rolling boil.  Boil 2-3* mins.My mother has made the following annotations to the recipe:  she's increased the final boil time to 5 minutes and written -- "Mold in *metal pan*.  Cool to room temperature then refrigerate.  Add 1/2 package gelatin for firmer sauce"
